mapper.insert:
insert into meta.mm_order_user ( id, order_code, tool_chain_name, tool_chain_oa_name, province_company, tool_chain_phone, permission_state, create_date, modify_date, creator_id, modifier_id, remark, pass_status, pass_time, order_id ) values
( #{item.id}, #{item.orderCode}, #{item.toolChainName}, #{item.toolChainOAName}, #{item.provinceCompany}, #{item.toolChainPhone}, #{item.permissionState}, #{item.createDate}, #{item.modifyDate}, #{item.creatorId}, #{item.modifierId}, #{item.remark}, #{item.passStatus}, #{item.passTime}, #{item.orderId} )
